metadata.name: The hypocritical man
metadata.description:
When the rotation of the Red Planet got out of control, the statue of the hypocrite man caused strange things to happen.

a video collage made by 2D & 3D objects.
illustrations are from very old persian book name book of the kings, and a statue is: A Hypocrite and a Slanderer By Franz Xaver Messerschmidt .German.

The elements in this composition are arranged in such a way as to express a theme.
